title: EASY

description.plain:
“EASY” is the title track of K-pop girl group LE SSERAFIM’s third mini album of the same name. It follows an unconventional take on the quintet’s music style. Based on a trap genre, it incorporates catchy vocals of an R&B style with an addictive, fluid melody.

The lyrics deliver a meaning of how nothing is easy. However, they are willing to make everything easy. It continues the team narrative that has been going on since its debut.

Before its release, KBS had banned its music video from broadcast due to the “risk of imitation” as explained by the company.

embed_content: Read “EASY” by LE SSERAFIM on Genius

body.plain:
“EASY” is the title track of K-pop girl group LE SSERAFIM’s third mini album of the same name. It follows an unconventional take on the quintet’s music style. Based on a trap genre, it incorporates catchy vocals of an R&B style with an addictive, fluid melody.

The lyrics deliver a meaning of how nothing is easy. However, they are willing to make everything easy. It continues the team narrative that has been going on since its debut.

Before its release, KBS had banned its music video from broadcast due to the “risk of imitation” as explained by the company.
